posts.raw_content:
Hey, I wanted to just say, I am having surgery soon and the procedure has a chance of death. I am hoping for the best, but I want to put this out there in case this is the last opportunity, that being here has been the best part of my life over the last how many years. All the highs and all the lows. I have tried going to church but honestly admit, even attending today I was unable to obtain belief. But what I do believe in is the great work that the people here have done.

I have had an issue where it felt like for years a gun was pointed at my head. I had to stay cool and calm and relaxed. I watched from the sidelines as one marriage ended, eventually another replaced it. I had my career go down the toilet as my employer pushed me out. And I am saving a lot of that pain and suffering for after this surgery when I am finally allowed to be angry and yell again. I can go back to fighting like hell.

Anyways, not trying to be depressing, I will survive and be strong again. Just wanted you to know, if I go silent for a few weeks, I didn't make it. They will open up my skull, repair my tyre so to speak. I will have a nasty scar. I may not believe in god, but I will happily accept any prayers and I tried asking one thing, to wake up after going to sleep.

We might not always get along, maybe my humour isn't always loved, but without this place, I don't think I could have waited all these years for surgery. This place has been my rock, kept me calm when I wanted to become violent and angry.
posts.author: KungPaoMcChicken
posts.title: If I am no longer here...
posts.content:
Hey, I wanted to just say, I am having surgery soon and the procedure has a chance of death. I am hoping for the best, but I want to put this out there in case this is the last opportunity, that being here has been the best part of my life over the last how many years. All the highs and all the lows. I have tried going to church but honestly admit, even attending today I was unable to obtain belief. But what I do believe in is the great work that the people here have done.

I have had an issue where it felt like for years a gun was pointed at my head. I had to stay cool and calm and relaxed. I watched from the sidelines as one marriage ended, eventually another replaced it. I had my career go down the toilet as my employer pushed me out. And I am saving a lot of that pain and suffering for after this surgery when I am finally allowed to be angry and yell again. I can go back to fighting like hell.

Anyways, not trying to be depressing, I will survive and be strong again. Just wanted you to know, if I go silent for a few weeks, I didn't make it. They will open up my skull, repair my tyre so to speak. I will have a nasty scar. I may not believe in god, but I will happily accept any prayers and I tried asking one thing, to wake up after going to sleep.
